Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
nincompoop \nin"com*poop\, n. [A corruption of non compos.] A fool; a silly or stupid person. [Law] [1913 Webster]
An old ninnyhammer, a dotard, a nincompoop, is the best language she can afford me. --Addison. [1913 Webster]
nincompoop n : a stupid foolish person [syn: {poop}, {ninny}]
